CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, pg. 5 reads: "Loendi Salute to Eckstine Huge Success at Famous Door - Big Night For Mr. B - When Billy Eckstine came home during Christmas Week for an engagement at the Stanley Theatre, the Loendi Club sponsored a highly successful homecoming week for the famous crooning Pittsburgher. The week of affairs was climaxed by a huge celebration at the Famous Door on Dec. 30.  Man, notables were on hand and Mr. B. received numerous gifts  in token of esteem...Sheriff Tom Whitten of Allegheny County gave Eckstine a gold deputy's badge..."
TitMainTitle: Sheriff Tom Whitten pinning gold deputy's badge on Billy Eckstine, on stage of Famous Door club
